name: MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusAntigen
title: Measles (Tests for measles virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Measles Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: Measles virus isolate)
